sen.j: 後宇多天皇に北面の武士として仕え、従五位下左兵衛佐まで上ったが、上皇の死後、出家して兼好（けんこう）を名乗った。
sen.e: Kaneyoshi served in the Hokumen no Bushi (the Imperial Palace Guards) for Emperor Gouda, and was finally promoted to Jugoinoge-sahyoenosuke (Junior Fifth Rank, upper grade, Deputy Chief of the Palace Guard of the Left); after the death of the retired emperor, he entered into the priesthood and changed his name to Kenko.
